com.googlecode.aluminumproject.tools.aludoc

Class AluDoc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.tools.aludoc.AluDoc

  • public class AluDoc
extends Object
    Generates documentation for libraries by processing an AluDoc template.

    The configuration for the template processor can be modified by adding configuration parameters. There are two default values:

    • the default locale is English;
    • the default resource bundle base name is "aludoc/messages".

    There are two methods that generate the documentation: one that uses a default template, and one that doesn't. In either case, the following context variables are available:

    • "libraries", a list that contains the libraries for which documentation is generated (by default, this list contains all available libraries, though certain libraries may be excluded);
    • "location", the desired output location for the documentation.
